parameters.name: rounds
parameters.description: Number of rounds of the study.Rounds repeate 123 in order

parameters.name: samestim
parameters.description: Whether the same stimuli should be used in each round.

parameters.name: trialsperblock
parameters.description: trials per block/set size to test.

parameters.name: stimset
parameters.description: List of characters to sample the stimulus set from.  Must contain at least as many as largest set size.
